select @@IDENTITY AS workFlowId
insert into tb_fun_workflow (BusinessID, PWorkFlowID, PWorkFlowIDS, Create_Time, OperatorID, DepartID, Deal_Content, Deal_Time, Over_Time, status, Over_Content ) values (#{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pWorkFlowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pWorkFlowIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dealContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{overTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{overContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update tb_fun_workflow set BusinessID = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PWorkFlowID = #{pWorkFlowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PWorkFlowIDS = #{pWorkFlowIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Create_Time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, operatorId = #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DepartID = #{departId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Deal_Content = #{dealContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Deal_Time = #{dealTime,jdbcType=DATE}, Over_Time = #{overTime,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} Over_Content=#{overContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where WorkFlowID = #{workFlowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
